title: 2020, Congress Response to Coronavirus
itunes:title: 2020, Congress Response to Coronavirus
description:
Guest host Anna Edgerton talked about the 2020 presidential election and the Trump administration’s reaction to the Coronavirus with panelists Adam Hodge, Senior Vice President at Ariel Investments and Lester Munson, Principal at government relations firm, BGR Group and Adjunct Faculty Member at Johns Hopkins University.


Anna also talked to Dan Flatley, Bloomberg Congressional reporter about congressional reaction to the Coronavirus.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
content:encoded:
